website_summaries.verdict: Much sturdier and more stable than its bargain price point suggests. Great birthday or holiday gift idea for families with children and limited play space.
pros: Will fit on a smaller table for young players
cons: Player configuration is 6 rows of 3 players, not the standard foosball arrangement
Very small play table (less than 35 inches)

customer_reviews.title: Great game. Poor legs...
customer_reviews.text: If assembled properly, which isn't really difficult, the product is nice and solid. My family is really enjoying it. I took off 1 star because of the legs. The solid parts of this table are all pressed board. They will not hold a screw for very long. The manufacturer therefore inserted a threaded metal sleeve into the legs. However, if you play the game vigorously - ahem - then the metal sleeve itself will dislodge. I removed all the sleeves - they were basically falling out on their own - and reset them with hot glue. So far - so good... If that fails to solve to the problem I'll probably just replace them with regular pieces of real wood.
customer_reviews.author: hacker

customer_reviews.title: Piece of sh**t. Don't believe the fake positive reviews.
customer_reviews.text: Spent two hours trying to assemble before we gave up. First off, the screws and bolts etc. were mislabeled. Even once we figured out the correct identity for the parts, the holes weren't big enough for the screws...we'd have to drill new holes and we refused to spent hours doing that. Assembly required should mean assembly, not new construction. Plus the material itself was flimsy. Save your money for an actual quality product and avoid this.
customer_reviews.author: David N.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent foosball table
customer_reviews.text: Excellent foosball table! We bought this for one our 9 year old for Christmas this year. It did require total assembly, but the instructions were easy to follow and all the pieces fit where they were supposed to! After it was set up, all five of my boys immediately wanted to play with it. It's held up extremely well and is often brought downstairs when we have company over. The kids love it. It's not flimsy at all, and it's a great size. I bought an extra set of soccer balls just to have on hand for when one of the two it comes with is lost. Overall, the kids love it and I enjoy playing it with them!
customer_reviews.author: Mindingpsych

customer_reviews.title: Good table - very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great table and great fun! No need to attach the legs. Just set it on the surface you want to use and play. I used an electric screwdriver to assemble it and got it together pretty quickly. The green turf is not the thickest so probably in a few years it will eventually warp but there are two cross-pieces underneath to keep it up and in shape. Pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: crazy8bargain

customer_reviews.title: Ill fitting parts, cheap workmanship, missing screws
customer_reviews.text: Bought two tables for locked down grandchildren. One was OK, only missmatched collection of woodscrews ( two thicknesses for the same part #) Another had missmatched grooves for inserting field board into sides, some drilled screw holes were not drilled, and most important: leg bolts were missing, a show stopper Emailed customer service - 4 business days, no joy. Even have a case number: Your Online Case # 21086 Created: Fx-40 Update: They called back after a week, lost all details but were nice about it and sent the bolts.
customer_reviews.author: Sagnamon Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Face your men correctly.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great! I did have a little problem with the way the players were facing.... the directions told you what color went where... but they didn't specify that you should make sure the men were facing the right way. It was easy enough to take one of the sides out and swap the men around to have them facing correctly.... the two colors face each other in the middle, and the defender next to the goal faces the opposite goal).
customer_reviews.author: Cambm46

customer_reviews.title: Nice little table
customer_reviews.text: Nice table for the price. Delivered in just a couple days. A gift for an active 4 yr old. Comes with 2 small soccer balls. Has manual score sliders at each end, not electric, which is fine. Assembled in 20 min. 2 small wood screws attach the cup catchers and scorers to the frame. No holes were drilled there, but the wood screws went right in. Had to teach the child not to put their weight on the table since it's not strong for that, but again, a fun little game.
customer_reviews.author: CH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the price. Zero regret purchasing it. The kids love using to table. Super easy to lift and move around the house to whatever location you want to play at. The only complaint from my kids was that it did not have the serving hole on the sides. I took a 1 1/4 drill and made the serving hole myself on both sides. Absolutely perfect table with super cheap price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Rubber handles arrived split and fall off easily
customer_reviews.text: Product fun for my kids but the rubber handles arrived split and slip off easily. I tried to use Amazon customers service to get new parts but they were not able to help. The knobs without rubber protectors are hard to use and hurt our hands. I may return it.
customer_reviews.author: Emily G. Singh

customer_reviews.title: Loads of fun, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: We love this! We've had it for a few months now with young, energetic boys and it has held up to their abuse. Bought the warehouse deal and really enjoy the endless fun. Yes, it is made with thin cardboard material for the bottom but we haven't had any issues with strength yet.
customer_reviews.author: Lilly Padd

customer_reviews.title: No foosball balls
customer_reviews.text: It’s Christmas Eve and we just assembled the table...realized they didn’t put a ball in the box. It’s suppose to have 2 balls. Instead there’s an extra of one of the other parts.
customer_reviews.author: MnG

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, recommended
customer_reviews.text: My kids absolutely loved it once I put it together. A couple of things- 1) The plastic handles are very hard to put though the poles. 2) The goal pre-drilled holes on bottom right were both slightly off 3) Just a preference, but I would much rather have a 1 GK player rather than 3 (I know why they did 3 as otherwise the corners would have to be inclined). Overall, a very good product. Just hoping it will last the abuse of 10 yr olds.
customer_reviews.author: Marcos Montenegro

customer_reviews.title: Fun foosball family time
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I hoped and expected it to be - a great fun table to play foosball with friends and family. I was able to put it together in about thirty minutes. The instructions were clear and all pieces were there in three boxes. Once assembled, my seven year old son and I had a great time playing for an hour and have since played quick games again and again. For parents looking for a non-video game diversion that helps you connect and have fun with your kids then you’d probably like this.
customer_reviews.author: Dan W

customer_reviews.title: not leveled - too long
customer_reviews.text: This product is NOT designed correctly. It is too long which makes the board not straight, so the ball rolls itself. Very disappointing with the price I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: nev

customer_reviews.title: We loved it so much we bought one as a gift
customer_reviews.text: We have a small house so it had to either fold up or store under a bed. I did a ton of research and this fit the bill. It is big enough for 4 people to play but small enough that its pretty easy to move around. It is quite sturdy and has sustained a lot of usage. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of two elementary kiddos

customer_reviews.title: Fun! Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son and I have tons of fun playing! Only drawbacks are making sure the men are facing the correct way...we learned the hard way and had to re-assemble it..it was a pain. Also the legs are weak, one broke off so we had to take them all off. However it functions well and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: MAngels

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and a whole lot of FUN!
customer_reviews.text: I love this table! I bought it for my 6 year old son because he wanted a foosball table but we don't have the extra space... this portable one is absolutely perfect! My husband assembled it in about 20 minutes and it's sturdy and seems to be well made. We've played a few games on it and have been spinning the handles full force and it's holding up wonderfully. Great buy! :) so much fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Sophia M.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived cracked but otherwise good product.
customer_reviews.text: This item looks decent and could be fun. Its easy to put together. My only issue is how this item was cracked during shipment which tells you it’s is not as sturdy. The box did not show any significant damaged or rip but somehow the item was cracked. Get it. It will be worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2one

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price paid
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item for my 5-year old grandson for Christmas. Son and son-in-law were able to put this together in a short time and all pieces fit well, and the grandsons were playing foosball soon after opening the gift. A month later, my grandson is still enamored with the game, and my son says he plays with it daily. Even his 3-year old brother is learning to play! Good for them with dexterity, and eye/hand coordination. Well worth the price. Would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene M. Geyer

customer_reviews.title: Compact Fun Table
customer_reviews.text: This is not for the pro's... strictly for pro's to play with kids and teach them. Fun little compact, table top foosball table. The only thing is that the table is super light so it moves around if you put it on the table.
customer_reviews.author: cristina

customer_reviews.title: Well made, lots of fun!
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality, went together well, and providing fun for our family. This is a great size when a full size foosball table is too big or too high -- we can put this on a low table or on the floor. My only (small) complaint is the handles could be made of a bit softer, more rubbery material.
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Not a real table with only 3 player bars for each player but good enough for toddlers discovering the game. Good quality for the price. Toddler might get hurt with the opposite bar pushing thru. Warn them ahead of time not to stand to close while playing. Overall the product brought lots of fun and good times.
customer_reviews.author: Bruno Cateni

customer_reviews.title: Good product, lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good quality, just wish it had the hole in the side to drop the ball in, but I am thinking of just adding that myself. The assembly wasn't too bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Alma

customer_reviews.title: It's fun but gets in the way
customer_reviews.text: The legs have broken off it 1 year later. We don't rough house with it but they aren't sturdy. The rest of the game is in perfect condition. My boys still use it. We keep it under a bed when not in use.
customer_reviews.author: A River Town Dock Man

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGED!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a xmas gift and it wasn't opened until several months after xmas. When I finally had my daughters open it, the table had a giant dent and hole in it. POOR QUALITY!
customer_reviews.author: Adam B

customer_reviews.title: Solid value for the price.
customer_reviews.text: For a $50+/- price tag, this is an outstanding buy. I give it 5 stars because of the value. You WILL NOT graduate to comptetion level foosball on this table, however; if you have small kids and you are looking for solid, non-electric fun and stimulation, this is the table and game for you. This game will also teach your children the rudiments of soccer/hockey and scoring along with how a team of players can work together to advance the ball. It's also good for eye-hand coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Amanaude

customer_reviews.title: Some defective screws
customer_reviews.text: Some screws are completely defective and it doesn’t tighten up. No extra screws. Edges are really sharp. I don’t know how I can return this. Really disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: xoundbox

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This foosball table was purchased as a gift for my 5 and 8 year old daughters and they absolutely love it. It came on time, was very easy to put together, and the quality seems to be very good. My only complaint with this item is the rubber pads that cover the four feet bend off and tear off almost immediately. Not a big deal as we can replace with stronger felt pads, so overall I highly recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Chris S

customer_reviews.title: Great value & Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Huge hit ar Christmas with the while family! Fits perfectly on our ottoman and we play for hours! Very well made. We didnt attach the feet and put rubber griooers on the bottom to keep it from sliding when we do play it on the table. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie & Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We bought it for our kids for Christmas. Easy to assemble and exceeded expectations for sturdiness. Our seven year old is really into playing and it’s held up great!
customer_reviews.author: elconejoblas

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this foosball table for my grandson, who loved it. It was easy to set up, but requires 2 people to carry it to the table to play.
customer_reviews.author: Ruthanne Sweeney

customer_reviews.title: Good product but no customer service...
customer_reviews.text: It's good quality and we really like it. For the money that we paid on Amazon, I think it's a good buy. The thing is that in the package somehow we were missing a #14 screw (3.5 x 14mm), and it's hard to find an identical one from local hardware store. We contacted the customer support (cs@sport-squad.com) but they did not respond at all. I don't think the customer service is good, thus deducting one star.
customer_reviews.author: WC

customer_reviews.title: Best game ever!
customer_reviews.text: If you like soccer this is perfect. Me and my little girl enjoy playing during cold winter months. Not so hard to assemble, you just have to follow the manual. The size is perfect, not to big but not too small. Really cool! Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Harry

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad table for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My 16 year old assembled and then I reassembled correctly, demonstrating that you need to pay close attention to instructions. Wish this was full sized. Works well.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J.

customer_reviews.title: Portable and fun
customer_reviews.text: The boys helped put it together. It was easy to understand instructions and to assemble with one minor exception. The tool that was included was difficult to use so we had to get our own screwdriver. Even with the screwdriver some screws were difficult to get in, but we did it!
customer_reviews.author: cbp

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for price, best for young kids
customer_reviews.text: Compact and cost effective fun for the kids and can store it away easily. It is very light and moves around a bit, which is fine for my kids which are gentle on play, but some more exuberant kids (or big kids, i.e. adults) might need something a little heavier.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey John B

customer_reviews.title: GREAT TABLETOP FOOSBALL GAME
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids were delighted with the foosball game. They elaborated on how much better it was than their old one, both in construction and appearance. It was a big hit!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Family fun nights!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality and family fun nights! My daughter 3 & 5 years old love it!
customer_reviews.author: Emilia

customer_reviews.title: i honestly love it, looks just like the picture the game ...
customer_reviews.text: i honestly love it , looks just like the picture the game in general is fun and overall it is a decent size not too small and not to big, came in great condition and it actually came early like literally 2 days(i chose slandered shipping) and it was well packaged :) overall i give it 4 stars because it was a struggle to put together ,that would have to be my only complaint , it took some time to get the screws in but it was a nice buy. im NOT disappointed :)
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this for christmas unless you want your christmas ruined
customer_reviews.text: Who puts a picture of the item on the outside of the box? Idiots. I ordered this as a surprise gift for my boys and it was delivered this morning on our porch with a big picture of the item on the outside of the box. When we came outside to get in the car, the boys learned immediately what their big gift for christmas is. BUMMER!!!!! I wish I had never ordered this.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Jason Burger

customer_reviews.title: Utter Trash
customer_reviews.text: Hands down the worst product I’ve ever purchased on Amazon. The holes in the metal poles were not aligned correctly, making affixing the players nearly impossible without me widening the holes with my own drill. The flimsy playing surface is not flush so the balls go to one corner. The feet are not true either, so the board wiggles. No thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R. Oestreich

customer_reviews.title: Great little foosball table - perfect for our ten year ...
customer_reviews.text: Great little foosball table - perfect for our ten year old son and easy enough for our five year old to play. Three handles are plenty for them. It sits on the coffee table in our living room and has been a focal point for my son's friends.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie G. Phillips-catton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price and more
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun and durable my wife and I as well as our two boys play and it is awesome
customer_reviews.author: Clem

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than I antisopated very pleased with the item
customer_reviews.author: Moonchild Tina k

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This was extremely easy to assemble and very sturdy. We’ve had it for a few months and it’s holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8 year old
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. A great beginner table for our 8 year old grandson with good functionality. Needs a flat table for optimum performance but very portable. Practice here and then move up to a more professional set costing 10x or more. Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: PAM

customer_reviews.title: Great family game
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids loved and still love playing. I sent this as a Christmas gift for my grandkids in Las Vegas so they wouldn't always be playing video games and they love it. Their dad, mom and friends have also played. This is a great way to bring the family together.
customer_reviews.author: Helen M. Shore

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a small area
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is great. Don't expect a full-size game, this is a smaller unit that goes on top of a table. It moves around with movement while playing, so I'm looking into a way to keep it still, but I do recommend it for kids 5-12
customer_reviews.author: Kaylen

customer_reviews.title: Compact size
customer_reviews.text: Not overly huge and doesn't take up a lot of space. I play with my son on the floor with it.
customer_reviews.author: darkybirdblue

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice size and kids love it.
customer_reviews.author: barb

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the legs broke in one week. The instructions were horrible and some parts were missing. The kids loved it , but quality very poor
customer_reviews.author: Aria S.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: Middle board is cheaply made. Was broken when unpacked, had to tape it back together Xmas eve just to get it working.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Strain

customer_reviews.title: LOve it
customer_reviews.text: it's a really nice table. just make sure your guys are facing the right way or you will need to rip it apart again!
customer_reviews.author: J. Stutzman

customer_reviews.title: Good for small kids
customer_reviews.text: For small family and small kids this one is good.vut quality is not really good... right with the money..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for a couple years now and my kids still enjoy it. The padding on the legs fell off ...
customer_reviews.text: We have had this for a couple years now and my kids still enjoy it. The padding on the legs fell off quickly but it is probably from sliding it around on the carpet. I find it to be well constructed and perfect for two people. My kids have managed to have 4 kids play and still have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Foster

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s definitely value for money .. fun activity for kids to play during get together
customer_reviews.author: Sachin Mali

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this FX40 Foosball Table for my son's room. This is a nice little table. It's very durable and was fairly easy to put together. My son and I have already had a ton of fun playing on this little table and his friends enjoy playing on it too. If you're not ready to go all out on a foosball table this little tabletop will offer up a ton of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Callend48

customer_reviews.title: A good choice.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this table, especially for the price. Assembly was not difficult and it is level and not many dead spots. Great for kids. My five year old loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Fanelli

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this, it’s nice that it’s easy to move to different locations and easy to store as he can just slide it under his bed. Overall the kids have a lot of fun playing this.
customer_reviews.author: MimiT

customer_reviews.title: Excellent construction for table top game
customer_reviews.text: Impressive quality at a great price. Came on time as described. Couldn't ask for any more.
customer_reviews.author: frankvoynar

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful gift
customer_reviews.text: Greatest gift ever for my 9 year old grandson, son many hours already spent playing. So many giggles. Got my money worth in the first few hours. 🥰
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Wohlford

customer_reviews.title: This Foosball table is AMAZING..
customer_reviews.text: This Foosball table is AMAZING ... it came quickly, was easy to assemble and it is great quality for money ... I am so pleased with this and my 5 year old son absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is very nice.
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a very nice table. Kind of an odd configuration. I would think there should be 3 defenders, 2 mid fielders and 3 forwards. Super fun.
customer_reviews.author: watabowtbob

customer_reviews.title: Our whole family had so much laugh and the best quality time
customer_reviews.text: Our whole family had so much laugh and the best quality time! You have to spend a little time assembling this toy, but oh boy, time is worth the wait! Super way to drag your kids away from gadgets and boring activities!
customer_reviews.author: Ekaterina

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and great for kids.
customer_reviews.text: Was a Xmas gift for 6 and 7 yo. They love it. Easy to put together. Sturdy. Plays smoothly. Seems like good quality. Can move from floor to table as needed and great for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to assemble. Works quite well for a table top. End caps are really difficult to put on, but the rest was quite easy - excellent instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Cobra6

customer_reviews.title: Horrible horrible product!!
customer_reviews.text: Pathetic product.. we had to spend couple hours to align holes. After few days of usage one of the rods have broken. Amazon has closed the return window - stuck with this piece of crap.
customer_reviews.author: MS

customer_reviews.title: Look like it expects a very gentle handling - but if ...
customer_reviews.text: Excited my 8 year old with this as B'day surprise gift. After 2 months, I am observing that legs have become shaky and it might not last an year. Look like it expects a very gentle handling - but if so, will such foosball be fun?. Already see the kids starting to spend lesser and lesser time with this.
customer_reviews.author: ANA

customer_reviews.title: Fun and sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: 9 year olds really enjoy this table! Okay, okay, I won't lie... I kinda have fun playing it too!
customer_reviews.author: julzz225

customer_reviews.title: Awesome foosball table
customer_reviews.text: Awesome foosball table! Very well put together- sturdy design and mechanisms, smooth playing surface, and an ideal size for a table top. My son loves it, and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Great table at this price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girls kid and I was surprised at the quality. Was pretty easy to put together as well. I highly recommend this table if you're looking for a table top game
customer_reviews.author: Pac

customer_reviews.title: Parts missing and the bottom is flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: There were parts missing and the bottom is very flimsy. I don't think it will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Gary G.

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for kids and parents!
customer_reviews.text: A source of great fun for my 8 year old son and myself. Whether you have a son or daughter, if they love soccer, this is a must. We have lots of competitive fun and laughs. Great fun for parents and kids to do together!
customer_reviews.author: P. Crosby

customer_reviews.title: Family Bonding Device
customer_reviews.text: By far one of he best game we have purchased for family bonding. Great quality, nice compact design, floor model is better than table version, helps little kids to be able to play.
customer_reviews.author: OnlineBee

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Fun and easy to play for kids. Makes a great gift
customer_reviews.author: oybek gusmanov

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and still sturdy! My kids are really enjoying it and I'm glad I didn't have to spend too much $ or space for it. It was easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: 110lbslost

customer_reviews.title: Durable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Much bigger than expected. Good quality, my son loves it. Very durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good foosball tablle
customer_reviews.text: My children (age 8 and 6) love it. The three-year old is too young, although she also wants to participate. So far the Foosball table survived a month of enthusiastic play without any damage, so it seems sufficiently stable and child-proof. It did take some time (30 minutes?) to screw together, but all the holes were in the right places, everything fitted, and if one follows the steps in the instructions, it is no problem. I recommend this to other parents.
customer_reviews.author: xxx

customer_reviews.title: Good and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I got this on thanksgiving discount and its a cute product which fits the description. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Great Table
customer_reviews.text: High quality for the price; very happy with this table.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Good toy, but not a good gift.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but do not recommend for a child’s gift. This did not arrive in a plain mailing box. It arrived via UPS with the original toy packaging, so Santa’s Christmas gift was ruined. Does require complete assembly, so make sure you have proper tools.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Yoshimoto

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for kids for the value of money
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as gift for my kids for the New year and they really enjoy it and easy to access and play since it is tabletop. We were able play as family and it is good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Dinesh Chander

customer_reviews.title: I like playing with this foosball game.
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5 years old. I played with my grandfather. I liked shooting goals. I liked blocking my grandfather's shots. I din't like that the ball got stuck in the corner.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Ruskin

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We got this for my sons birthday and he loves it, great quality and fun to play with
customer_reviews.author: Meysam

customer_reviews.title: Good table but beware legs.
customer_reviews.text: Legs are not sturdy. They came off after a few days of playing. I used plastic wall anchors and the existing screws for the legs and now it is solid. Otherwise it is a good product.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: We are missing a part:  SSF1001-06  (4)
customer_reviews.text: This is a gift, so we'd like to get the part as soon as is possible.
customer_reviews.author: Donna B

customer_reviews.title: But the item was fine. It was easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: box came broken. But the item was fine. It was easy to put together. We have a lot of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: duttgirl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. The kids love it, we also love it very much. Very sturdy, it has survived many tournaments. Not too easy to assemble but once you get it done, it worths every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Ngoc Huynh

customer_reviews.title: It is not very sturdy and the players are a very hard plastic
customer_reviews.text: It is not very sturdy and the players are a very hard plastic... Ball control is almost non existent...It's a fun game to play with the kids and putting it together wasn't too hard at all. Just do not tighten the screws to much the cheap material will split..
customer_reviews.author: 954Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Great quality foosball table
customer_reviews.text: Great quality foosball table. It is a little larger than I realized but it was easy to assemble and plays very well.
customer_reviews.author: K Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just turned six and loves the game. Took awhile to put together!
customer_reviews.author: kay Harr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Great game, great price, easy to assemble. Grand kids Love It in their gameroom!!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie elliott

customer_reviews.title: but I like how well-made this one is
customer_reviews.text: There are fancier versions of this game, but I like how well-made this one is, and the proportions of it. It's big enough to be fully enjoyed, but compact enough to not take over a room.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great table for price
customer_reviews.text: Great table! Nice size for a table top foosball and fits under the bed
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tons of fun for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice table-top foosball table. It's a nice design, looks good, works well. The kids are having tons of fun with it.
customer_reviews.author: D11RDozer

customer_reviews.title: Non screen non stop action!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Super for the money! Just leave the legs off, they break anyway, but otherwise its super tuff and fun! Btw a golf ball sorta works in a pinch if u lose the ball. Have super (non screen) fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Ianiro

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: After 2 days of use one of the legs fell off and broke.
customer_reviews.author: august mom

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great table game. My whole family is having a lot of fun. Easy to assemble and start playing.
customer_reviews.author: foxy2bella

customer_reviews.title: its cool.
customer_reviews.text: Its ok for a tabletop set, it definitely doesn't compare to a real table. One of the players lost the screw holding him in unfortunately and we had to rig him ourselves. But for a tabletop, its cool.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Cyn

customer_reviews.title: Prime example of our throw away culture.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poorly processed box of parts. You will need to spend some time assembling this garbage. I am a woodworker by trade and spent some time gluing and clamping this crap together for my son so he can at least enjoy it for his bday. Disgraceful.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew F.

product_meta.title: Sport Squad FX40 40 inch Table Top Foosball Table for Adults and Kids - Compact Mini Tabletop Soccer Game
feature_bullets: UNPLUG & PLAY: Enjoy fast paced play on this compact tabletop foosball table. Stay active and spend quality time with family and friends. Bring it to a family gathering, birthday party, or tailgate event. DIMS: 40"L x 20"W x 8"H and weighs 15 lbs.

FOOSBALL PLAYERS ARE PRE-ASSEMBLED ON THE RODS FOR FASTER TABLE ASSEMBLY: This classic version of table soccer is fun for all ages. Chrome-plated steel rods are ideal for swift shots while the rubber grooved handles enable a strong, stable grip.

GOOOOOOAAAALLLL!: Superior MDF design is built to withstand competitive and convenient play. The FX40 Foosball table includes two goal boxes with ball return. The soccer table also features non-marking rubber pads to protect all your table surfaces.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: Sport Squad listens and learns from your feedback to create quality gameroom equipment for kids & adults. If you're not 100% satisfied or have product suggestions our customer service team is available to help.

SPORT SQUAD - BRINGING FAMILY AND FRIENDS TOGETHER: As an American based company, Sport Squad brings new innovation to playing indoors and outdoors by introducing affordable, quality sports, lawn, tailgate, carnival, and game room games to market.
